snippet.title: Dark Lessons Gameplay Trailer: June 2024
snippet.description:
Can you survive your teacher? Wishlist my psychological horror game Dark Lessons on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2675700/Dark_Lessons/

With only candles for light and trapped in her home, you have to uncover her family's dark secrets. Solve puzzles, connect the dots and escape. But beware: There is someone else playing games with you, and someone who needs your help.
